resources.string: Destroy all enemy ships and protect the starbase.
This is a tutorial mission in which you will learn the basics.
In the survival mode you keep all loot and experience even if you lose the battle. Also there will be a special reward if you manage to win.
This is a special mission. It is pretty hard but the reward worth it.
This mission has been completed for today. Come back tomorrow.
Win a duel to unlock this ship. Attack and defense bonuses are not working here.
Your ship class must be $1 or smaller.
Our long-range scanners detected some suspicious activity here. We should investigate it.
Are you sure you want to abort the mission? You won\'t be able to return.
This colony was infected with an unknown pathogen
This is an empty star system.
Try your hand at fighting other players' starbases
